verses.verse: The <S%H5971>people<s%> were <S%H596>complaining<s%> in the <S%H7451>ears<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%> When <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H639>it,<s%> his anger was <S%H2734>kindled;<s%> and <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%>'s <S%H784>fire<s%> <S%H1197>burnt<s%> among <S%H398>them,<s%> and consumed some of the <S%H7097>outskirts<s%> of the <S%H4264>camp.<s%>
The <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H6817>cried<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses;<s%> and <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H6419>prayed<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and the <S%H784>fire<s%> <S%H8257>abated.<s%>
<S%H1931>The<s%> <S%H8034>name<s%> of that <S%H4725>place<s%> was <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H8404>Taberah,<s%> because <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%>'s <S%H784>fire<s%> burnt among <S%H1197>them.<s%>

The mixed <S%H628>multitude<s%> that was <S%H7130>among<s%> them <S%H183>lusted<s%> <S%H1121>exceedingly:<s%> and the children of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> also <S%H1058>wept<s%> <S%H7725>again,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> "Who will give us <S%H1320>flesh<s%> to <S%H398>eat?<s%>

We <S%H2142>remember<s%> the <S%H1710>fish,<s%> which we <S%H398>ate<s%> in <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> for <S%H2600>nothing;<s%> the <S%H7180>cucumbers,<s%> and the <S%H20>melons,<s%> and the <S%H2682>leeks,<s%> and the <S%H1211>onions,<s%> and the <S%H7762>garlic;<s%>
but now <S%H5315>we<s%> have lost our <S%H3002>appetite.<s%> There is nothing at all <S%H1115>except<s%> this <S%H4478>manna<s%> to look <S%H5869>at.<s%>"
The <S%H4478>manna<s%> was like <S%H1407>coriander<s%> <S%H2233>seed,<s%> and its <S%H5869>appearance<s%> like the <S%H5869>appearance<s%> of <S%H916>bdellium.<s%>

The <S%H5971>people<s%> went <S%H7751>around,<s%> <S%H3950>gathered<s%> <S%H2912>it,<s%> and ground it in <S%H7347>mills,<s%> or <S%H1743>beat<s%> it in <S%H4085>mortars,<s%> and <S%H1310>boiled<s%> it in <S%H6517>pots,<s%> and <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H5692>cakes<s%> of <S%H2940>it.<s%> Its taste was like the <S%H2940>taste<s%> of <S%H3955>fresh<s%> <S%H8081>oil.<s%>
When the <S%H2919>dew<s%> <S%H3381>fell<s%> on the <S%H4264>camp<s%> in the <S%H3915>night,<s%> the <S%H4478>manna<s%> fell on <S%H3381>it.<s%>

<S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H1058>weeping<s%> throughout their <S%H4940>families,<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> at the <S%H6607>door<s%> of his <S%H168>tent;<s%> and the <S%H639>anger<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> was <S%H2734>kindled<s%> <S%H3966>greatly;<s%> and <S%H4872>Moses<s%> was <S%H7489>displeased.<s%>

<S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> "Why have you treated with your <S%H5650>servant<s%> so <S%H7489>badly?<s%> Why <S%H4672>haven't<s%> I found <S%H2580>favor<s%> in your <S%H5869>sight,<s%> that you <S%H7760>lay<s%> the <S%H4853>burden<s%> of all this people on <S%H5971>me?<s%>

Have I <S%H2029>conceived<s%> all this <S%H5971>people?<s%> Have I brought them <S%H3205>forth,<s%> that you should <S%H559>tell<s%> <S%H5375>me,<s%> 'Carry them in your <S%H2436>bosom,<s%> as a <S%H539>nurse<s%> <S%H5375>carries<s%> a nursing <S%H3243>infant,<s%> to the <S%H127>land<s%> which you <S%H7650>swore<s%> to their <S%H1>fathers?<s%>'

<S%H370>Where<s%> could I get <S%H1320>meat<s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> to all this <S%H5971>people?<s%> For they <S%H1058>weep<s%> to <S%H559>me,<s%> saying, <S%H5414><s%> 'Give us <S%H1320>meat,<s%> that we may <S%H398>eat.<s%>'
I am not <S%H3201>able<s%> to <S%H5375>bear<s%> all this <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H905>alone,<s%> because it is too heavy for <S%H3515>me.<s%>

If you <S%H6213>treat<s%> me this <S%H2026>way,<s%> please kill me right <S%H2026>now,<s%> if I have <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H2580>favor<s%> in your <S%H5869>sight;<s%> and <S%H7200>don't<s%> let me see my <S%H7451>wretchedness.<s%>"

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H622>"Gather<s%> to me <S%H7657>seventy<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> of the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> whom you <S%H3045>know<s%> to be the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of the <S%H5971>people,<s%> and <S%H7860>officers<s%> over <S%H3947>them;<s%> and bring them to the <S%H168>Tent<s%> of <S%H4150>Meeting,<s%> that they may stand there with <S%H3320>you.<s%>

I will come <S%H3381>down<s%> and <S%H1696>talk<s%> with you <S%H680>there.<s%> I will take of the <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> which is on <S%H7760>you,<s%> and will put it on <S%H5375>them;<s%> and they shall bear the <S%H4853>burden<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> with <S%H5375>you,<s%> that you not bear it yourself alone.

<S%H559>"Say<s%> to the <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H6942><s%> 'Sanctify yourselves against <S%H4279>tomorrow,<s%> and you will <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H1320>flesh;<s%> for you have <S%H1058>wept<s%> in the <S%H241>ears<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "Who will give us <S%H1320>flesh<s%> to <S%H398>eat?<s%> For it was <S%H2895>well<s%> with us in <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>" Therefore <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> will <S%H5414>give<s%> you <S%H1320>flesh,<s%> and you will <S%H398>eat.<s%>

You will not <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> nor two <S%H3117>days,<s%> nor <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%> neither <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%> nor <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%>

but a whole <S%H2320>month,<s%> until it come <S%H3318>out<s%> at your <S%H639>nostrils,<s%> and it is <S%H2214>loathsome<s%> to <S%H3282>you;<s%> because that you have <S%H3988>rejected<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> who is <S%H7130>among<s%> <S%H1058>you,<s%> and have wept <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H559>him,<s%> saying, "Why did we come <S%H3318>out<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt?<s%>"'"

<S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "The <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H7130>among<s%> whom I <S%H8337>am,<s%> are six <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H7273>men<s%> on <S%H559>foot;<s%> and you have said, <S%H5414><s%> 'I will give them <S%H1320>flesh,<s%> that they may <S%H398>eat<s%> a <S%H3117>whole<s%> <S%H2320>month.<s%>'

Shall <S%H6629>flocks<s%> and <S%H1241>herds<s%> be <S%H7819>slaughtered<s%> for <S%H4672>them,<s%> to be sufficient for <S%H1709>them?<s%> Shall all the fish of the <S%H3220>sea<s%> be gathered <S%H622>together<s%> for <S%H4672>them,<s%> to be sufficient for them?"

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> "Has <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%>'s <S%H3027>hand<s%> grown <S%H7114>short?<s%> Now you will <S%H7200>see<s%> whether my <S%H1697>word<s%> will happen to you or <S%H7136>not.<s%>"

<S%H4872>Moses<s%> went <S%H3318>out,<s%> and <S%H1696>told<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh;<s%> and he <S%H622>gathered<s%> <S%H7657>seventy<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> of the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of the <S%H5971>people,<s%> and <S%H5975>set<s%> them <S%H5439>around<s%> the <S%H168>Tent.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> came <S%H3381>down<s%> in the <S%H6051>cloud,<s%> and <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H680>him,<s%> and took of the <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> that was on <S%H5414>him,<s%> and put it on the <S%H7657>seventy<s%> <S%H2205>elders:<s%> and it happened that when the <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> <S%H5117>rested<s%> on <S%H5012>them,<s%> they prophesied, but they did so no <S%H3254>more.<s%>

But <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> <S%H7604>remained<s%> in the <S%H4264>camp.<s%> The <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H259>one<s%> was <S%H419>Eldad,<s%> and the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H8145>other<s%> <S%H4312>Medad:<s%> and the <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> <S%H5117>rested<s%> on <S%H3789>them;<s%> and they were of those who were written, but had not gone <S%H3318>out<s%> to the <S%H168>Tent;<s%> and they <S%H5012>prophesied<s%> in the <S%H4264>camp.<s%>

A young <S%H5288>man<s%> <S%H7323>ran,<s%> and <S%H5046>told<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> and <S%H5046>said,<s%> <S%H419>"Eldad<s%> and <S%H4312>Medad<s%> are <S%H5012>prophesying<s%> in the <S%H4264>camp!<s%>"

<S%H3091>Joshua<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5126>Nun,<s%> the <S%H8334>servant<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> one of his chosen <S%H979>men,<s%> <S%H6030>answered,<s%> "My <S%H113>lord<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> forbid <S%H3607>them!<s%>"

<S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H7065>him,<s%> "Are you jealous for my <S%H5414>sake?<s%> I wish that all <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%>'s <S%H5971>people<s%> were <S%H5030>prophets,<s%> that <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> would <S%H5414>put<s%> his Spirit on <S%H7307>them!<s%>"
<S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H622>went<s%> into the <S%H4264>camp,<s%> he and the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

A <S%H7307>wind<s%> from <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> went <S%H5265>out<s%> and <S%H1468>brought<s%> <S%H7958>quails<s%> from the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> and let them <S%H5203>fall<s%> by the <S%H4264>camp,<s%> about a <S%H3117>day<s%>'s <S%H1870>journey<s%> on this <S%H3541>side,<s%> and a <S%H3117>day<s%>'s <S%H1870>journey<s%> on the other <S%H3541>side,<s%> <S%H5439>around<s%> the <S%H4264>camp,<s%> and about two <S%H520>cubits<s%> above the <S%H6440>surface<s%> of the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

The <S%H5971>people<s%> rose <S%H6965>up<s%> all that <S%H3117>day,<s%> and all the <S%H3915>night,<s%> and all the <S%H4283>next<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> and <S%H622>gathered<s%> the <S%H7958>quails.<s%> He who gathered <S%H4591>least<s%> <S%H622>gathered<s%> <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H2563>homers;<s%> and they <S%H7849>spread<s%> them all <S%H7849>abroad<s%> for themselves <S%H5439>around<s%> the <S%H4264>camp.<s%>

While the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> was <S%H2962>yet<s%> between their <S%H8127>teeth,<s%> before it was <S%H3772>chewed,<s%> the <S%H639>anger<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> was <S%H2734>kindled<s%> against the <S%H5971>people,<s%> and <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H5221>struck<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> with a <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H4347>plague.<s%>
The <S%H8034>name<s%> of that <S%H4725>place<s%> was <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H6914>Kibroth<s%> <S%H6912>Hattaavah,<s%> because there they buried the <S%H5971>people<s%> who <S%H183>lusted.<s%>
From <S%H6914>Kibroth<s%> Hattaavah the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H5265>traveled<s%> to <S%H2698>Hazeroth;<s%> and they stayed at <S%H2698>Hazeroth.<s%>
